issue.title: [C++] DictionaryBuilder does not correctly report length and null_count
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4374](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4374). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In comparison to most builders, they stay constantly at 0.
